channel.title: Server help
channel.description: Hey Guys, I am new to coding and want to start off on a high an with some help, i was just wondering if someone could help me with making npc talk with the text i want making shops and changing items in it and changing the ip adress i have hamachi btw. If you guys could refer me to an easy server or something that that would be great i am using Pkf btw as my source and client thanks once again. Magicana89

Hey Guys,
